body.name: IRONCK Bookcases and Bookshelves Triple Wide 5 Tiers Industrial Bookshelf with Baffles Large Etagere Bookshelf with Metal Frame for Living Room Home Office
features: Size: 69.3"W x11.8"D x69.3"H. Each shelf of this storage book case can hold on to 66 lbs
2.8in baffles to stop things falling down
Features with 14 shelves, this Triple Wide large display shelf can maximize the vertical storage space while keep your daily essentials in organize
8 Large Iron Frame, Simple structure, the clearly part numbers and installation steps make the assembly much easier
Made of solid MDF boards and stylish matte black iron brackets,the industrial color make this display rack well match your other furniture for your living room, bedroom, study or office
Tipover Resistance Device prevent the bookshelf from toppling or wobbling
The adjustable bottom small feet and X shaped brackets can keep balance and stability of the bookshelf
If you get any problem with our products, please feel free to contact us
body.description: IRONCK Triple Large Industrial Bookshelf 5 Tiers Simple, Stable, Durable The IRONCK Bookcase is a perfect blend of industrial style and warmth. The non-scratch black metal frames paired with MDF board shelving create strong and roomy shelves that are perfect for display or storage. The IRONCK Bookcase creates vast and ample open storage space that is perfect for holding your favorite books and decor items. It’s a favorite for any room of your home, from your bedroom to your living room. The bookshelf is made of metal and P2 grade MDF board and measures 69.3"W x 11.8"D x 69.3"H. It ships ready-to-assemble with step-by-step instructions.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: IRONCK Triple Large Industrial Bookshelf 5 Tiers Simple, Stable, Durable The IRONCK Bookcase is a perfect blend of industrial style and warmth. The non-scratch black metal frames paired with MDF board shelving create strong and roomy shelves that are perfect for display or storage. The IRONCK Bookcase creates vast and ample open storage space that is perfect for holding your favorite books and decor items. It’s a favorite for any room of your home, from your bedroom to your living room. The bookshelf is made of metal and P2 grade MDF board and measures 69.3"W x 11.8"D x 69.3"H. It ships ready-to-assemble with step-by-step instructions. Sleek Contemporary Design Strong & Sturdy Construction Easy to Assemble

Keep Things Organized The IRONCK bookshelf features baffles on each shelf to prevent items from falling down. MDF Board and Iron Frame The IRONCK large bookshelf is made of MDF board and iron frame, which makes it more stable and durable than bookcases made of bamboo. Adjustable Feetpads The footpads can be adjusted to ensure that the storage shelf remains stable even on uneven floors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and Stylish
reviews.reviewText: I love this shelving unit. I bought it to put Lego sets on. It looks so good that I’m going to order a second one and the matching entertainment center. My husband said it was easy to put together and surprisingly sturdy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for home libraries
reviews.reviewText: Holds almost 500ibs of books perfectly; not a single shelf is warping. It looks great, and was super easy to set up BUT pay attention while building it!! It’s so easy to build that it is also easy to not realize when you goof up. Took about 2 hours to build the shelf, and 30 mins to fix the mistake I made

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great system for displaying collectables and books!
reviews.reviewText: Unit was pretty easy to assembly and went together well. Once assembled I was impressed by the amount that can be held and displayed and appreciated the wide height between shelves which will allow for larger hardback books. The only callout would be that if you are going to display a lot of paperback books you will probably want to use bookends because items can fall between the gaps between the levels. Other than that very minor concern, which I was aware of, this is an excellent shelving system and very stable and solid.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars As a Book Hoarder, I can really appreciate these shelves!
reviews.reviewText: Ever since my dad took me to the Salvation Army in Washington, DC when I was a little kid, I've been hooked on books. We have a room in our house that we turned into a library - it's full. This bookshelf is currently in my 2-car garage (which was never used for cars at all!). The shelves in there are also full. (Okay, not just books - other memorabilia as well!) I use the "Retreat Room" for my new age passion. I collect tarot and oracle cards as well as every book imaginable on the subject. I ran out of room and this bookshelf spoke to me. SO easy to put together! It's extremely sturdy - as you can see, I don't have it hooked to a wall (no room!) I've promised myself that when this shelf is full...NO MORE BOOKS. (Will never happen, ha!)Honestly though - this shelf had very easy directions (pictures - always a good thing!) and as an individual, I had no problems putting it all together. The shelves are a beautiful dark brown and the racks are nicely powder-coated black metal. All in all, I am very happy with these shelves and can't wait until the weather cools a bit so I can spend more time in there!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great shelving unit. Easy assembly. Looks great. Already bought a second one and looking about getting a third. Great for displaying collectables.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 22, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Looks amazing, could be more sturdy
reviews.reviewText: Despite some of the pictures from the other reviews, mine was shipped with virtually 0 noticeable damage. One board might have had a minor scratch, but overall it was fine.One note, the boards are a little darker than they appear in the photo. For me, it's a good thing, since most of my furniture is darker anyway.But overall, I'm quite satisfied with my purchase. It looks awesome, it's plenty spacious, and it'll be a wonderful addition to any home.I WILL say though, especially if you have pets, DEFINITELY plan in using the included wall anchors. I'm using my shelves for my board game collection, so it's got plenty of weight on it, and while it's sturdy ENOUGH, if you plan to use it for anything lighter and/or more valuable, it would behoove you to anchor it.Also, if you buy this and you're assembling it, don't 100% follow the instructions. When you're assembling the outer shelves, make sure you line up all of the available holes beforehand. The instructions gives a vague "just follow these steps twice for each side," but that doesn't account for the holes needed to join the outer shelves via the inner shelf.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Like it so much, I'm buying another one!
reviews.reviewText: Well constructed, sturdy, simple instructions, and adjustable feet. I'm going to get another one!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth Every Penny!
reviews.reviewText: I am so happy I bought this shelf! Sturdy for what it is, great price point in my opinion, and pretty easy to assemble! Just make sure the right lettered metal pieces mate with the correct letters hahaha. I put the wrong ones together and couldn't figure out where I went wrong, super simple to figure out once I realized what I did though.I am not someone who can assemble shit easily- this was very stress free for me! The only real time consuming part is putting the back of the shelves on the shelves themselves. It's one screw thing in the middle so it will move back and forth at first till you get it tight. Screwing it in on the sides once you have the metal frames together sinches it all together nicely. I moved recently and have the basement room- this was fantastic for my space size wise and I was able to put so much of my stuff on it! Totally would buy again.
